patterns: What is the syllabus for CPCT?
Can you share the topics for DSA?
What topics are covered in Data Science?
Tell me about the syllabus for C Programming
What is in the MERN Stack course?
responses:
CPCT: Basic computer knowledge, typing, and MS Office skills.
Java: Basics, OOP concepts, libraries, GUI development, and Android fundamentals.
DSA: Arrays, Linked Lists, Trees, Graphs, Sorting & Searching, Dynamic Programming, and Problem-Solving.
Data Science & ML: Python, Pandas, Numpy, Visualization, ML algorithms, and AI basics.
C Programming: Basics, Operators, Loops, Functions, Pointers, Structs, and File Handling.
C++: OOPs, STL, Memory Management, and Advanced Concepts.
MERN Stack: MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js development.
Frontend Development: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, and Tailwind CSS.
Backend Development: Node.js, Express.js, REST APIs, and Database Management.
Full Stack Development: Combination of Frontend, Backend, and Deployment.
CPCT (Computer Proficiency Certification Test) includes basic computer knowledge, typing, MS Word, MS Excel, and PowerPoint. Fee: ₹5,000.
DSA (Data Structures and Algorithms) covers Arrays, Linked Lists, Trees, Graphs, Searching, Sorting, and Dynamic Programming. Fee: ₹10,000.
Data Science and Machine Learning include Python, Pandas, NumPy, Visualization, Supervised and Unsupervised Learning, and AI basics. Fee: ₹15,000.
MERN Stack includes MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js. You’ll learn to build full-stack web applications. Fee: ₹18,000.
Frontend Development includes HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, and Tailwind CSS. Fee: ₹8,000.
Backend Development includes Node.js, Express.js, REST APIs, and Database Management. Fee: ₹10,000.
Full Stack Development combines Frontend (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js) and Backend (Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB). Fee: ₹20,000.
